price: Alif - Laam - Raa. (Woi yε) Nwoma a emu nsεm no sipi wᴐ nimdeԑ mu, afei yɛakyerεkyerε mu pefee; efri (Otumfoͻ) Nyansafoͻ , Amane bͻ Wura no hͻ (sε):
arabic: الٓرۚ كِتَٰبٌ أُحۡكِمَتۡ ءَايَٰتُهُۥ ثُمَّ فُصِّلَتۡ مِن لَّدُنۡ حَكِيمٍ خَبِيرٍ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: alif-lam-ra kitābun uḥ'kimat āyātuhu thumma fuṣṣilat min ladun ḥakīmin khabīrin
